data: {"concept_id": "character_flaw", "concept_name": "Character Flaw", "type": "element", "definition": "Imperfect edge that trips a character up—fear, pride, denial, obsession—creating internal conflict and friction that shape choices and relationships.", "scope_notes": "Flaw surfaces four ways: said, shown, revealed in consequences, and reflected by others’ reactions. Potency dials low→medium→high and can shift scene to scene.", "axes": "surface|potency", "axis_values": "say|show|consequence|others_react | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "drive|decision_style|backstory|body_logic|voice|tension", "conflicts_with": "label_only|plot_puppetry|resetting_consequences|flat_arc", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_flaw_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_flaw_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_say_confess", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "say", "description": "Character states or jokes/confesses about the flaw (admission, complaint, defensive line).", "detection_hint": "Look for first-person labels, self-deprecation, vows to ‘do better’.", "false_positive_risks": "Empty label with no behavioral proof.", "minimal_example": "“I can’t stop lying.” / “I’m stubborn, okay?”", "counterexample": "Boast or joke never echoed in action.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_show_behavior", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "show", "description": "Behaviors enact the flaw repeatedly (impulses, avoidance, sabotage, outbursts).", "detection_hint": "Patterned actions under pressure; leaks in body logic and choices.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off incident unrelated to motive or stakes.", "minimal_example": "He checks her phone again; she ‘forgets’ the meeting—again.", "counterexample": "Random clench with no consequences.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_consequence_fallout", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "consequence", "description": "Fallout reveals the flaw’s cost (trust breaks, lost chances, public damage).", "detection_hint": "Track immediate + delayed effects; reputation shifts; guilt/shame.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle with total reset; no cost carried.", "minimal_example": "Friend stops answering; promotion goes to someone else.", "counterexample": "Big scene, next chapter everything’s fine.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_others_react", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "others_react", "description": "Other characters’ reactions mirror the flaw (confront, enable, withdraw, boundary-set).", "detection_hint": "Note who pushes back, who enables, and how tone shifts over time.", "false_positive_risks": "Crowd reacts inconsistently with no relation to history or stakes.", "minimal_example": "Intervention; ultimatum; quiet avoidance at dinner.", "counterexample": "Random eye-rolls unearned by prior behavior.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_potency_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Soft, manageable flaw expression: small habits, minor ripples, mostly private.", "detection_hint": "Casual admissions, subtle body tells, tiny setbacks; gentle reactions from others.", "false_positive_risks": "Zero link to choices; purely atmospheric.", "minimal_example": "A shy deflection; a missed text; a friend teases but stays.", "counterexample": "No behavior change at all; decorative quirks only.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_potency_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Noticeable struggle shaping choices and relationships; real but reversible costs.", "detection_hint": "Confrontations, strained trust, missed opportunities; some self-awareness.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy conflict with no causal thread.", "minimal_example": "Refuses help and the project slips; partner sets a boundary.", "counterexample": "Argue loudly then everything resets next scene.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "signal_id": "sig_potency_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Overwhelming expression: destructive patterns, public fallout, irreversible damage.", "detection_hint": "Breakups, firings, legal/moral collapse; confessions or defiant declarations.", "false_positive_risks": "Shock value without lasting consequence.", "minimal_example": "He burns the bridge on purpose; she relapses on camera.", "counterexample": "Huge blowup followed by status quo.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "misconception_id": "label_only", "description": "Naming the flaw without showing it.", "tells": "Self-descriptions stand in for behavior.", "likely_causes": "Rushing to categorize.", "corrective_feedback": "Show repeated choices + cost; tie to stakes.", "micro_drill": "Replace 2 ‘I’m X’ lines with actions + a consequence.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "misconception_id": "plot_puppetry", "description": "Flaw behavior appears only when the outline needs drama.", "tells": "OOC flips for twists.", "likely_causes": "Forgetting pre-signals and fallout.", "corrective_feedback": "Pre-signal with habits; carry consequences.", "micro_drill": "Add one earlier leak + one later cost.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "misconception_id": "resetting_consequences", "description": "Fallout evaporates; relationships and status reset.", "tells": "No memory of prior damage.", "likely_causes": "Fear of complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Carry at least one cost across three scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 3 sticky consequences; keep one alive.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_flaw", "misconception_id": "flat_arc", "description": "Flaw never escalates or softens; no growth or spiral.", "tells": "Same beat repeated.", "likely_causes": "Static arc mapping.", "corrective_feedback": "Use potency dials; escalate or relieve with context.", "micro_drill": "Write Low→Med→High or Med→Low ladder on one thread.", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_flaw_identify_surface_potency", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "For each passage, label surface (say/show/consequence/others_react) and potency (low/medium/high). Justify with one concrete cue.", "expected_features": "Correct surface+potency; cites evidence; notes cost or publicness.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels + precise evidence + cost/publicness note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels off or evidence vague"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include label-only and spectacle-reset traps.", "hint_steps": "1) What proves the flaw? 2) Who pays? 3) How public?", "variation_axes": "surface|potency", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_flaw_escalate_control", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Take a low-potency flaw moment and escalate it to medium, then high—by changing action, consequence, and others’ reactions (not adjectives).", "expected_features": "Edits change reversibility, visibility, and cost; reactions evolve.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear Low→Med→High with sticky fallout", "Meets": "Some escalation; partial fallout", "Developing": "Wordier, same stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Adjective inflation trap.", "hint_steps": "1) Add action 2) Add consequence 3) Add reaction", "variation_axes": "stakes|publicness|frequency", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_flaw_trace_fallout", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Arrange a sequence: Say → Show → Consequence → Others React, annotating how each step raises or lowers potency.", "expected_features": "Causal chain intact; dials visible; no reset.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Reads inevitable; dials explicit", "Meets": "Chain present; minor gaps", "Developing": "Loose list; resets"}, "distractor_strategy": "Coincidental outcomes.", "hint_steps": "1) Place admission 2) Place behavior 3) Land cost 4) Show response", "variation_axes": "sequence|cause_effect", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_flaw_fix_label_only", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Replace a label-only admission with two actions and one consequence that reveal the same flaw.", "expected_features": "Behavior + cost make the label unnecessary.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Flaw vivid without naming", "Meets": "Some behavior/cost present", "Developing": "Still tells instead of shows"}, "distractor_strategy": "Pretty self-descriptions.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick two revealing actions 2) Land a small cost", "variation_axes": "behavior|cost", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_1", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "say|low", "label": "strong", "text": "“I’m a little territorial,” she laughs, and pockets his spare key.", "context_tags": "admission|foreshadow", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_2", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "show|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He rereads her texts, deletes the apology, and drives past the restaurant anyway.", "context_tags": "jealousy|avoidance", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_3", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "consequence|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "The group chat goes quiet after his outburst; invites stop for a month.", "context_tags": "social_cost", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_4", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "others_react|high", "label": "strong", "text": "“We’re done covering for you,” they say, and change the locks.", "context_tags": "boundary|irreversible", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_5", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "consequence|high", "label": "strong", "text": "She leaks the file; the grant is revoked; her name trends for the wrong reason.", "context_tags": "public_fallout", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_weak_1", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "“I’m flawed,” he says, then behaves perfectly forever.", "context_tags": "label_only", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_flaw_weak_2", "concept_id": "character_flaw", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Massive meltdown; next chapter everyone forgot.", "context_tags": "reset", "source_file": "Character Flaw.md", "source_md5": "2ef26397a7d50c5952299d630535fa9d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:31:55.957914Z"}
